deposit(address,uint256).details: Reverts if the token transfer fails for any reason.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

depositTo(address,address,uint256).details: Reverts with `FxERC20TokenNotMapped` if `childToken has not been deployed through a mapping request.Reverts if the token transfer fails for any reason.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

returns._0: True if `forwarder` is trusted, false if not.

params.rootToken: address of token on root chain

params.data: Empty if the receiver is the same as the tokens sender, else the abi-encoded address of the receiver.

returns.magicValue: `bytes4(keccak256("onERC20Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)"))` (`0x4fc35859`) to accept, any other value to refuse.

receiveMessage(bytes).details: This function verifies if the transaction actually happened on child chain

params.inputData: RLP encoded data of the reference tx containing following list of fields  0 - headerNumber - Checkpoint header block number containing the reference tx  1 - blockProof - Proof that the block header (in the child chain) is a leaf in the submitted merkle root  2 - blockNumber - Block number containing the reference tx on child chain  3 - blockTime - Reference tx block time  4 - txRoot - Transactions root of block  5 - receiptRoot - Receipts root of block  6 - receipt - Receipt of the reference transaction  7 - receiptProof - Merkle proof of the reference receipt  8 - branchMask - 32 bits denoting the path of receipt in merkle tree  9 - receiptLogIndex - Log Index to read from the receipt

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Note: This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

returns._0: True if the interface is supported, false if `interfaceId` is `0xffffffff` or if the interface is not supported.

FxERC20InvalidMappingOnExit(address,addr.notice: Thrown when a deposit request refers to an invalid token mapping.

FxDepositERC20(address,address,address,u.notice: Emitted when some ERC20 token has been deposited.

FxWithdrawERC20(address,address,address,.notice: Emitted when some ERC20 token has been withdrawn.

TokenMappedERC20(address,address).notice: Emitted when an ERC20 token has been mapped.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposits an `amount` of `rootToken` by and for the message sender.Note: Approval for `amount` of `rootToken` must have been previously given to this contract.

depositTo(address,address,uint256).notice: Deposits an `amount` of `rootToken` by the message sender and for a `receiver`.Note: Approval for `amount` of `rootToken` must have been previously given to this contract.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Checks whether a forwarder is trusted.

mapToken(address).notice: Map a token to enable its movement via the Fx Portal

receiveMessage(bytes).notice: receive message from  L2 to L1, validated by proof

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Returns whether this contract implements a given interface.

userdoc.notice: Fx root fixed supply ERC20 tunnel.
